headline.0: 3 Skincare Crimes I Know You're Guilty of Committing

short_description.0: Remember when your mother used to say you're only hurting yourself? That's right. Committing these skincare crimes is just making things worse for your skin. Our poor skin doesn't need a magical elixir or potion; it just needs a little TLC and SPF.

authors.0:
Janna Mandell, Contributor
